message: Check
that was easy
Made it on over. Looks like a mini-twitter.
Looks nice. A bit like wave.  Are there any stand alone apps for this?
@timechick I don't think so yet, but I think they do have an API, so maybe soon.
@ashipkowski Yes. Half-Twitter, Half-Wave. I now know how to describe it.
*waves* Hello folks
@jthurley *poke* Did you really think it was going to take long for me to join? This is just the first time I've been at my keyboard since you started this thing. :P
@Tanwyn I have attachment issues. :p
@jthurley hehehe, I never would have guessed. :)
@Tanwyn Yay for intro, as well. I'm over at adf.org trying to figure out how to get us listed, then we need to start actual discussings. :D
@Tanwyn Squeeeee
Gods help us, I've discovered the ADF Wiki
oh my.
@jthurley *blinks* You're really just discovering the wiki?? Really?
I'm just discovering I already have edit privileges....
That's what makes it a Wiki.
(in my view, at least)
@ashipkowski Indeed. Yay group creation.
I need to get around to looking at the wiki seriously.  I just have so many demands on my time.  I need to make a little more room...

@vanye111 It's probably telling that the only other Convore group I'm in right now is GTD. Seriously, if you haven't looked at Getting Things Done, do so. It's a godsend for learning how to spend time on what's important.
@jthurley I shall I have to do that....when I find the time. lol
